groupTitle: This photo essay documents the '2026년 식품의약품안전처 시무식' (2026 Ministry of Food and Drug Safety New Year's Kick-off Ceremony) held on January 2, 2026, capturing the speech by Commissioner Oh Yu-Kyoung, the audience, and interactions with staff, emphasizing a unified start to the new year.
title: This photo essay documents the '2026년 식품의약품안전처 시무식' (2026 Ministry of Food and Drug Safety New Year's Kick-off Ceremony) held on January 2, 2026, capturing the speech by Commissioner Oh Yu-Kyoung, the audience, and interactions with staff, emphasizing a unified start to the new year. - 1

scenes.text: 오유경 처장님이 신년사를 통해 2026년 식약처가 나아가야 할 방향과 비전을 제시하고 있습니다. 밝은 표정에서 새해에 대한 기대가 느껴집니다.
scenes.title: 2026년 새해 비전 선포
scenes.imagePrompt: Watercolor style, High Quality Photo of Commissioner Oh Yu-Kyoung standing centrally behind a dark wooden podium bearing the MFDS logo, delivering a speech into a microphone. She is wearing dark attire and glasses, smiling. The background is a large, plain light beige wall and a wooden floor.
scenes.subtitle: 오송보건의료행정타운

scenes.text: 넓은 강당을 가득 채운 직원들이 신년 시무식에 집중하고 있습니다. 모두가 새로운 시작을 함께 축하하며 의지를 다지는 자리입니다.
scenes.title: 새해를 향한 열정
scenes.imagePrompt: Watercolor style, High Quality Photo capturing a wide view of a large, tiered auditorium filled with attendees seated in blue chairs, facing a wooden stage. The stage is visible on the left, where a person in a dark suit is standing behind a podium, addressing the crowd. Overhead lights illuminate the scene, and the walls are paneled wood.
scenes.subtitle: 후생관 대강당

scenes.text: 시무식 현수막 아래, 처장님의 격려와 당부의 말씀이 울려 퍼집니다. 직원들은 박수로 화답하며 힘찬 새해를 다짐합니다.
scenes.title: 격려의 메시지
scenes.imagePrompt: Watercolor style, High Quality Photo showing a speaker standing center stage behind a podium during an event. The stage features a Korean flag and another organizational flag. Above the stage is a large blue banner reading "2026년 식품의약품안전처 시무식". The foreground shows the backs of audience members seated in dark blue chairs, clapping.
scenes.subtitle: 시무식 강연

scenes.text: 시무식이 끝난 후, 직원들과의 따뜻한 악수와 인사를 나누는 모습입니다. 소통과 화합으로 함께 나아갈 2026년을 기대합니다.
scenes.title: 소통과 화합의 인사
scenes.imagePrompt: Watercolor style, High Quality Photo depicting Commissioner Oh Yu-Kyoung, wearing a dark suit, smiling widely while shaking hands with a younger male employee in a dark sweater in a well-lit hallway. Another official in a suit stands slightly behind her, also smiling. The background features tiled gray walls and recessed lighting.
scenes.subtitle: 직원과의 만남

scenes.text: 주요 관계자들이 한자리에 모여 기념 촬영을 했습니다. 안전한 식약 환경 조성을 위해 헌신할 것을 다짐하는 단체 사진입니다.
scenes.title: 핵심 관계자 단체 사진
scenes.imagePrompt: Watercolor style, High Quality Photo showing a large group of approximately twenty officials, both male and female, dressed in suits and professional attire, standing shoulder-to-shoulder on the stage beneath the "2026년 식품의약품안전처 시무식" banner. They are posing formally, some clapping. The foreground shows multiple rows of empty blue auditorium seats.
scenes.subtitle: 2026년 다짐
